name: SCP: Pocket Dimension (v0.1.1 ALPHA)
description:
In the game, you will experience Jump and Run in the horrible Pocket Dimension that corrupted by corrosions and rotten fleshes. Based on SCP-106. Introduction

Date: June 18, 2008
Country: [DATA REDACTED]

"Hey Josh, I am Alex! I know a good place to go this summer holidays for fun!
The place we go: An old village without any people.
Are you scared? No, I don't believe there's some ghosts or monsters like some movies.
We can find some treatures!"

"This is the content of the letter from him."
